long_description: When you're all about finding a summit or a backcountry powder stash, the Burton Splitboard snowboard pack helps get you - and everything you need to carry-there in comfort and style. Ergonomic shoulder harness, compression-molded back panel and hipbelt provide comfort for a long day of snow play. Horizontal splitboard and vertical snowboard carry options let you tote your own ride into the backcountry. Includes a hydration sleeve (reservoir sold separately). The Burton Splitboard snowboard pack features internal shovel/probe storage, a water-resistant front pocket with drain for wet climbing skins and a fleece-lined goggles pocket.
short_description: When you're all about finding a summit or a backcountry powder stash, the Burton Splitboard snowboard pack helps get you - and everything you need to carry-there in comfort and style.
